key.name: max-autotiled-windows
key.summary: Stop auto-tiling new windows when there are this many windows already tiled.

key.name: undecorate-tiles
key.summary: This setting is experimental, and may break in certain situations.

key.name: undecorate-mode
key.summary: "border" removes title but leaves border / drop shadow. "none" removes both titlebar and border. This setting only takes effect when "undecorate-tiles" is true.
